summary: Build a professional, mobile-friendly marketing website for Pachavda Event Management Company (Sanand, Gujarat) to showcase services and portfolio, build trust, and generate booking inquiries via WhatsApp/calls/forms with SEO and fast performance.
architectural_notes: Business/location focus: Pachavda Event Management Company in Sanand, Gujarat; target areas Sanand, Ahmedabad, nearby.
Primary goal is lead generation (WhatsApp/calls/forms) and showcasing portfolio to build trust.
Design theme: light blue + black accents on white background; modern/elegant, clean layout with large images.
SEO/local keyword focus: event planner in Sanand, wedding decorator Sanand, birthday decoration Sanand, event management near Ahmedabad, wedding decoration services Gujarat.
Technical: HTTPS via SSL, domain/hosting, Google Maps integration, Google search submission, image compression for speed.
Ensure contact details (phone/WhatsApp number) are centralized (single config/source of truth) so updates propagate to all CTAs and links.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Replace the artwork with the uploaded circular blue emblem logo, centered on a clean wide canvas and optimized for web (pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png > pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page marketing website for “Pachavda Event Management Company” with these pages and navigation: Home, About Us, Services, Gallery, Testimonials, Contact.
Implement the Home page layout including: a hero/banner section with large event imagery, a short company introduction, service highlights, and a prominent “Book Now” call-to-action.
Implement the About Us page including: company story, mission & values, and experience & expertise sections (use English placeholder copy that can be edited later).
Implement the Services page that lists these services: Wedding Decoration, Birthday Decoration, Corporate Events, Stage Setup, Flower Decoration, Balloon Decoration, Lighting & Sound.
Implement the Gallery page to display a portfolio of past event work supporting both images and videos (use a grid layout with lightbox/modal viewing for images and embedded playback for videos).
Implement the Testimonials page/section to display customer feedback cards (use English placeholder testimonials with names/initials and optionally a rating).

Implement the Contact page including: visible phone number, a “Call Now” button (tel: link), a WhatsApp button (wa.me link), a Google Maps embed for Sanand, Gujarat, India (using an iframe embed), and a contact/inquiry form with fields: Name, Phone number, Event type, Event date, Location, Message.
Add a site-wide floating or persistent WhatsApp chat button and a site-wide Call Now button optimized for mobile usage.

Implement inquiry/booking submission flow so that submitting the website inquiry form (a) stores the inquiry in the backend canister and (b) shows a success message to the user; also provide an optional “Continue on WhatsApp” action that opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message containing the submitted form details.
Apply the specified design direction consistently across the site: light blue + black + white color palette, modern & elegant style, clean layout, large event images, and easy navigation.

Add on-page SEO basics for local discovery: set page titles/descriptions, include the provided SEO keywords naturally in page copy where appropriate, add Open Graph tags, and include a simple JSON-LD LocalBusiness schema with business name and location (Sanand, Gujarat, India).

Optimize performance for fast loading: compress/optimize local images, use responsive image sizing where possible, lazy-load below-the-fold media (gallery), and avoid loading heavy assets on initial render.
Add social media links (placeholders if URLs are not provided) in the site footer/header and ensure they open in a new tab.

Create a simple “Setup & Launch” documentation page in-app or as a dedicated frontend route that lists what the business owner must do for domain/hosting, SSL (HTTPS), and Google Search submission, using neutral step-by-step guidance (no external service integration).
Add a clear placeholder section for future expansion items (without implementing them): Online booking system, Pricing packages page, Blog, Instagram gallery integration.

Create and include a set of locally hosted static placeholder brand/media assets and wire them into the UI (logo/wordmark, hero banner, and gallery placeholders). Store generated assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend.

Update the site WhatsApp contact details to use the new WhatsApp number 8780410844 everywhere it is displayed or linked, including the floating WhatsApp action button, the Contact page WhatsApp link/button, and any other UI that reads from shared business contact info.
Update the WhatsApp inquiry follow-up flow so that the "Continue on WhatsApp" action opens WhatsApp to the new number 8780410844 (and does not use any outdated hardcoded `wa.me` number).

Add the uploaded logo image(s) as static frontend assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and ensure they are optimized for web use (keep transparency if present, avoid visible compression artifacts).
Replace the current header logo image (`/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png`) so the Site Header displays the new uploaded logo instead of the old placeholder wordmark.
Update site metadata imagery to align with the new logo by adding a favicon/app icon based on the uploaded logo and wiring it into `frontend/index.html`.

Replace the Site Header logo image (the at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1]`) by updating the static asset used at `/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png` so it uses the newly uploaded logo image (`download-1.webp`). Keep the existing image path so no other parts of the UI break.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create core website pages: Home, About Us, Services, Gallery, Testimonials, Contact
Home page hero banner with event photos, intro, service highlights, and prominent Book Now CTA
Services page listing offerings (wedding, birthday, corporate, stage setup, flower/balloon decor, lighting & sound)
Gallery for photos/videos of past events
Contact page with phone, WhatsApp button, Google Map embed, and inquiry/booking form
Lead capture features: WhatsApp chat button, Call Now button, and inquiry form fields (name, phone, event type/date, location, message)
Mobile-friendly responsive design with modern, elegant clean layout and large event imagery
Performance: fast loading with image compression/optimization
SEO setup: on-page SEO for local keywords, Google search submission, and basic technical SEO
Add social media links and optional future expansion items (pricing packages, blog, Instagram gallery integration, online booking system)
Backend: implement data model and APIs in the single Motoko actor to store and list inquiries (at minimum: id, timestamp, name, phone, eventType, eventDate, location, message).
Update WhatsApp contact number to 8780410844 across the site (WhatsApp button/link and any pre-filled WhatsApp inquiry message)
Add or update the Pachavda Event Management Company logo asset (replace placeholder logo/wordmark across the site)
